column1: The sacrifices that America’s veterans have made for our nation are unparalleled and we all owe it to them to go out of our way today  – and every other day of the year – to thank them for their incredible service. Happy #VeteransDay https://t.co/S3F3yyZAdI

Last night’s record-shattering victory at the polls was made possible by Nebraskans in all 93 counties coming together behind Ben -- and we can’t say thank you enough for all the generosity support and effort you’ve poured into this campaign. Thank you Nebraska! https://t.co/LziaMNjg5C

Polls are open but will be closing at 7 PM MT/ 8 PM CT. We need every conservative to get out and vote to defend the Senate! Have you voted yet?  Find your polling place here: https://t.co/elckx1DYqa https://t.co/m47kGZN5Cf

Polling locations are officially OPEN in all 93 counties! We need all hands on deck to defend conservative leaders like Ben up and down the ballot before the polls close. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/elckx1DYqa https://t.co/3cW03qG57N

This campaign has been unforgettable -- and we need your vote tomorrow! We wouldn’t be here without you on our team and we couldn’t be any more excited to send Ben back to DC to continue delivering for Nebraska. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/elckx1DYqa https://t.co/7ieTFHT7Xa

The @NEFarmBureau is backing Ben in this election because he’s delivered for our farmers and ranchers every step of the way in the Senate – delivering big wins like USMCA that helped make the most productive land in the world even more productive. https://t.co/kEMlczttoV

We’ve made incredible strides forward in the fight to defend unborn lives together – and Ben is Nebraska’s pro-life candidate for U.S. Senate. Join him by adding your name in defense of life https://t.co/pUwYOIvG1q https://t.co/Z6R0bjriah

Ben Sasse is one of the most conservative senators in Washington fighting for issues that Nebraskans care about. Ben kept his promises and now he’s counting on your vote this November 3rd. https://t.co/ibBe0SkjFP
Meet Kelty. She's one of the pups that Javelan trains to help vets who suffer from PTSD. https://t.co/wHNxrkjpbT

Justice Barrett was just confirmed to the Supreme Court! This isn’t a win for Republicans or a loss for Democrats. It’s a win for our Constitution the federal judiciary and for every single American citizen. Join Ben to congratulate Justice Barrett here: https://t.co/0FtfFg6ifI https://t.co/B5SvVUmDrj

Will you help us keep the Senate in conservative hands while we still can? https://t.co/PR8fbFqb6J https://t.co/f7T50TtWqh

“Attacks on religious liberty have no place in Congress. The Constitution is pretty simple: No religious tests for office period." - Senator Ben Sasse https://t.co/Mx0HIBkILj https://t.co/hh40aYxLPa

19 years ago America was shaken to its core – but far from broken. We can never afford to forget the 2977 Americans who lost their lives on 9/11 – or how we came together as one to rise from the rubble in the days which followed. #NeverForget

Ben is the first Nebraskan to serve on the Judiciary Committee in 4 decades. He’s worked to confirm 2 Supreme Court justices & over 190 federal judges.   It’s one of the most important jobs the Senate has — and Ben will keep standing up for judges who will defend our Constitution https://t.co/bJqWoWB6p3

The last President in our civics series Abraham Lincoln is often considered the greatest to hold the office. Today we’re studying his comments on mob rule and why it’s never the right answer. #CivicsvsSocialism2020 https://t.co/PtPeqOTu2A

The Great Communicator always had a phrase for the moment. Today our civics lesson focuses on the dangers of big government as told by President Ronald Reagan. #CivicsvsSocialism2020 https://t.co/RFhtrQ5pwL

The third president in our civics series and the third president in our country’s history Thomas Jefferson placed a high value on an educated citizenry. Watch below ⬇️⬇️ #CivicsvsSocialism2020 https://t.co/Uw8AeHIXuQ

In honor of President’s Day we’ll be taking a trip through America’s past. We need to teach basic civics to the next generations and this week we’re going to study civics as taught by our presidents — starting with George Washington (who else!). #CivicsvsSocialism2020 https://t.co/ncEKDlvK9F

BIG news for Nebraska farmer and ranchers: Months of hard work have paid off -- President Trump just signed USMCA into law.   This deal is a win-win. Our farmers and ranchers are going to make a bunch of money selling delicious Nebraska ag to our neighbors in Canada and Mexico. https://t.co/sFe7mqyPuj
